entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
